sqlMap.select: select id, rsa_password, create_time, device_type, device_id, mac, imei, os, resolution, carrier_operator, network_ingmode, blue_tooth, app_version, notify_id, imsi, cpu, memory, main_camera, front_camera, display_screen, iccid, meid, is_jailbroken, is_pirated, lang_info, bro_kernel, openudid, uuid, udid_log, rsa_privkey from base_device where id = #id:INTEGER#

select id, rsa_password, create_time, device_type, device_id, mac, imei, os, resolution, carrier_operator, network_ingmode, blue_tooth, app_version, notify_id, imsi, cpu, memory, main_camera, front_camera, display_screen, iccid, meid, is_jailbroken, is_pirated, lang_info, bro_kernel, openudid, uuid, udid_log from base_device
order by $orderByClause$
